scripts.start:docker-compose: yarn generate:docker-compose && docker compose --project-directory . --project-name 'node-template' -f docker/generated/docker-compose.yml up
scripts.build:docker: yarn build && docker build -f docker/node.Dockerfile -t main .
scripts.generate:docker-compose: docker compose  -f docker/docker-compose.yml -f docker/compose_fragments/version.yml -f docker/compose_fragments/secrets.yml --project-directory . config > docker/generated/docker-compose.yml
